answers.answer: Hi,Are you on any medications for your diabetes? Is the blood sugar level under control?What allergy symptoms are you having on your neck? Could you describe them?Is your blood pressure in the normal range? Have you consulted your doctor for the nose bleeds?What medications are you taking  currently?It would help if you could provide the above details so that we could help you with your queries.Regards.

question: I think i have got allergy on my neck,i don't know what exactly it is ! I have got this problem from 2-3yrs & 3 months ago i have been diagnosed as a diabetic pateint ! My arms + legs give me a feeling of something burning in them & i do have synapse problem ( nose bleeds continously ) & my age is 45yrs.I want to know are all these problems because of diabetes?warts or something else?I hope i will get your reply soon.Regards,xxx
title: Allergy on neck.
